sentences.sContent: Ready meals sell well because of their convenience.
sentences.sCn: 即食餐因为方便销路好。

sentences.sContent: ...no one can deny the fact that the new information age has brought us so much convenience that we are allowed to get plenty of information just with a simple click sitting in front of the computers...
...communication through the internet could bring us both convenience and inconvenience...
...When telegraphs and trains brought in the idea that convenience was more important than content...

phrases.pCn: 便利抽样；方便抽样；任意抽样

trans.tranOther: the quality of being suitable or useful for a particular purpose, especially by making something easier or saving you time
